metadata.title: CVE-2022-1515 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory leak was discovered in matio 1.5.21 and earlier inMat_VarReadNextInfo5() in mat5.c via a crafted file. This issue canpotentially result in DoS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.23-2
matio-tools - 1.5.23-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.23-2').
